Uses of Interface
com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api.IRVDataSourceCredential

Packages that use IRVDataSourceCredential
Package Description
com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api
Main Reveal API Package containing the interfaces to be implemented in order to control how Reveal BI works.

  • Uses of IRVDataSourceCredential in com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api

    Classes in com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api that implement IRVDataSourceCredential
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  RVAmazonWebServicesCredentials
    The class used to represent authentication for AWS, like required by data sources like Athena or S3.
    class  RVBearerTokenDataSourceCredential
    The class used to represent Bearer (aka 'Token') authentication.
    class  RVUsernamePasswordDataSourceCredential
    The class used to represent domain/user/password credentials, required to connect to all data bases (MS SQL, MySQL, etc) and some other data sources (REST API for example).
    Methods in com.infragistics.reveal.sdk.api that return IRVDataSourceCredential
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    IRVDataSourceCredential IRVAuthenticationProvider.resolveCredentials​(String userId, RVDashboardDataSource dataSource)
    Returns the credentials to use for this data source, null means there are no credentials associated and the data loading process will fail.
